GSD.product_version: versions from v5.17 to before v5.17.4
GSD.description:
cachefiles: unmark inode in use in error path

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.4 by commit b2055abafd3d4ee0376fb3eed5cae866316995a1, it was introduced in version v5.17 by commit 1f08c925e7a38002bde509e66f6f891468848511. For more details please see the references link.
